entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,950Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 143

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter

entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 220,698Chapters: 24/35Kudos: 603

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 442,245Chapters: 42/?Kudos: 1,128

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,738Chapters: 3/16Kudos: 41

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.title: Do You Got Room For One More Troubled Soul?
entry.summary:
Author: KuroNekoFe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,887Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 53

Summary: In which Jason and Dick became best friends and fell in love before Bruce took Jason in and when Dick was still Robin. But that doesn't mean that love is ever easy. Dick sighs and shakes his head, exasperated. “So who is he?” he asks. “Some newly orphaned kid, like I was?” “His name is Jason Todd,” Bruce tells him. Dizzying awe abruptly replaces Dick's irritability. A spark of hope lights up his chest. His voice is barely above a whisper as he asks, “Jason?”
